author: sboag
msg: In setRoot in the strange fixup code for preceding of an attribute,
use dom helper to get the owner of the node, so that we don't
get NULL for a generic DOM.

author: sboag
msg: Since an attribute can have a child in the DOM, but not in XSLT,
check for attributes before calling getFirstChild.

author: sboag
msg: Allow DOMSource to be registered.  Part of bug fix where relative
URLs weren't being resolved for DOM processing.
